radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent atelectasis. No consolidation, pleural or pericardial effusion. Single hypodense lesion measuring 7 mm at the dome of the liver. 11-mm cyst from the lower pole of the left kidney. Abnormal appendix in the right lower quadrant measuring 11 mm, fluid-filled, containing a hyperdense appendicolith at the base with mild periappendiceal fat stranding.
